meanings.definition: A print made using the photolithography process.
meanings.sent2: I bought a beautiful photolithograph of a sunset.
meanings.sent3: The photolithograph of the cat wearing sunglasses made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a photolithograph of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The photolithograph captured the essence of nature perfectly.

meanings.definition: To create a print using the photolithography process.
meanings.sent1: She learned how to photolithograph her artwork.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to photolithograph the landscape.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally photolithographed my hand on the paper.
meanings.sent4: His words were photolithographed in my memory.
meanings.sent5: The photographer will photolithograph the image onto the canvas.
